title: The cities curbside recycling program only accepts plastic containers with necks.  Why don\'t they accept other  plastic containers that are identified on the bottom as recyclable?
text:
You can actually recycle more than just bottles, but the regulations
can be confusing. Here's a link that can answer you questions:

http://green.blogs.starnewsonline.com/10450/ever-green-law-to-ban-trashing-plastic-bottles-starting-in-october/
